headline: AMD earnings, Netflix-Warner Bros. hearing: What to Watch
summary: Market Domination Overtime Host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Tuesday, February 3, including earnings results from companies like Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG), Pfizer (PFE), and Merck (MRK), and the Senate hearing on Netflix's (NFLX) proposed bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

content.title: AMD earnings, Netflix-Warner Bros. hearing: What to Watch

Market Domination Overtime Host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Tuesday, February 3, including earnings results from companies like Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG), Pfizer (PFE), and Merck (MRK), and the Senate hearing on Netflix's (NFLX) proposed bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: AMD Reports Earnings Today. Gains From Agentic AI Aren’t ‘Fully Priced In.’
summary: Advanced Micro Devices  will report its fourth-quarter earnings after the close on Tuesday.  The consensus among analysts is that AMD will report December quarter revenue of $9.67 billion with adjusted earnings per share of $1.32.  On Friday, HSBC analyst Frank Lee reaffirmed his Buy rating on AMD shares and raised his price target to $335 from $300.

content.title: AMD Reports Earnings Today. Gains From Agentic AI Aren’t ‘Fully Priced In.’
content.summary: Advanced Micro Devices  will report its fourth-quarter earnings after the close on Tuesday.  The consensus among analysts is that AMD will report December quarter revenue of $9.67 billion with adjusted earnings per share of $1.32.  On Friday, HSBC analyst Frank Lee reaffirmed his Buy rating on AMD shares and raised his price target to $335 from $300.

headline: These Stocks Are Today’s Movers: Palantir, Teradyne, Tesla, AMD, NXP Semiconductors, and More
summary: Stock futures were rising Tuesday as Palantir’s strong earnings injected renewed optimism around the artificial-intelligence trade.  Palantir Technologies  jumped 10% in premarket trading after the company, which sells artificial-intelligence software to manage and analyze large amounts of data, reported better-than expected fourth-quarter adjusted earnings.  Revenue jumped 70% from a year earlier to a record $1.41 billion on strong demand for its AI technology.

Revenue jumped 70% from a year earlier to a record $1.41 billion on strong demand for its AI technology.

headline: Assessing Whether Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) Still Looks Undervalued After Strong One Year Returns
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) has drawn fresh attention from investors after recent share price moves, with the stock showing mixed short term returns and a strong one year total return profile. See our latest analysis for Advanced Micro Devices. The recent 1-day share price return of 4.03% at a latest share price of $246.27 comes after a mixed few months, where a 30-day share price return of 10.20% and a 1-year total shareholder return of 115.52% sit alongside modest short term pullbacks...

headline: These Stocks Are Today’s Movers: Palantir, Teradyne, Tesla, PepsiCo, AMD, NXP Semiconductors, and More
summary: Stock futures were rising Tuesday as strong earnings from Palantir Technologies injected renewed optimism around the artificial-intelligence trade.  Palantir Technologies  jumped 11% in premarket trading after the company, which sells artificial-intelligence software to manage and analyze large amounts of data, reported better-than expected fourth-quarter adjusted earnings.  Revenue jumped 70% from a year earlier to a record $1.41 billion on strong demand for its AI technology.

headline: AMD And GIGABYTE Tie Up Puts Focus On On Device AI Value
summary: AMD (NasdaqGS:AMD) and GIGABYTE are expanding their partnership to push on-device AI across laptops, motherboards, and OLED monitors. The collaboration focuses on AI gaming laptops with AMD processors and AI agent controls, AI tuned motherboard features, and screens optimized for gaming and creation. The move highlights AMD’s AI platform ambitions beyond data center use and into everyday consumer and creator devices. For you as an investor, this tie up puts a spotlight on how AMD is trying...

headline: S&P 500, Nasdaq poised for higher open as earnings deluge takes center stage
summary: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq looked set for a firm open on Tuesday, stabilizing after a commodity rout in the previous session, as investors geared up for ​a flood of corporate results through the week.  Palantir Technologies jumped 11.2% in premarket trading after upbeat results highlighted demand ‌for its military-grade AI tools, with U.S. defense spending helping lift quarterly sales.  "Palantir's good earnings is helpful for the AI trade," said John Campbell, senior portfolio manager, Allspring Global Investments.

content.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq poised for higher open as earnings deluge takes center stage
content.summary: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq looked set for a firm open on Tuesday, stabilizing after a commodity rout in the previous session, as investors geared up for ​a flood of corporate results through the week.  Palantir Technologies jumped 11.2% in premarket trading after upbeat results highlighted demand ‌for its military-grade AI tools, with U.S. defense spending helping lift quarterly sales.  "Palantir's good earnings is helpful for the AI trade," said John Campbell, senior portfolio manager, Allspring Global Investments.
